data.name: Tales Of The Death
data.detailed_description:
ALSO RECOMMENDED FOR YOU:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1613960/The_Death_Into_Trouble/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1307880/Hanoi_Puzzles_Solid_Match/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1646520/Clock_Overwhelmed/


About the Game

Samael, the friendly reaper of souls, tells his adventures with his friends and co-workers. Discover other points of view in the story of The Death Into Trouble, unlock the bestiary of creatures from beyond and other original stories.

Features

  • 3 books with mini tales from The Death Universe;
  • More than 30 unique hand-drawn illustrations;
  • A clever mix of visual novel and puzzle;
  • With the narrative language of motion comics;
data.about_the_game:
Samael, the friendly reaper of souls, tells his adventures with his friends and co-workers. Discover other points of view in the story of The Death Into Trouble, unlock the bestiary of creatures from beyond and other original stories.

Features

  • 3 books with mini tales from The Death Universe;
  • More than 30 unique hand-drawn illustrations;
  • A clever mix of visual novel and puzzle;
  • With the narrative language of motion comics;
data.short_description: Join a comic adventure in a hand-drawn book with a life of its own. Rearrange the panels of an animated comic to reveal the stories of the world of The Death.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon R7 370 or higher
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
